Comments_List: How to read and understand a book deeply.

I got insights of the society by reading 1984 and successfully found the connections between the novel and the real world.
Also, I developed my writing skills when I made a comment of the book with templates and I realized the importance of others' point of view.

First, the reading part only involves reading the book 1984 after class, which is kind of tedious and can hardly improve my reading skills in fact.
Moreover, the writing part is much less than reading, only involves writing a passage once a week after class. I hope it can have more improvise writing in class.

Strengths: Students can communicate with each other freely and develop the ability of critical thinking. Also, the feedbacks and suggestions of my performance are very clear and useful.
Weaknesses and ways to improve: Some students were too shy to take part in the interaction. To ensure that everyone gets involved in the class, I suggest that teacher can come up with more ideas to encourage those students.

I strongly recommend the course.
For example, I learned how to apply "They Say I Say" to my own writing, which can clarify my topic. What's more, this template taught me how to communicate with others, that is to say, how to understand and report others' statements and voice my opinions.
